en.subject: Easy Communities | Reset your password
en.text:
Hej {{USER_NAME}}!

Password reset?
Here is a link you need for this:
{{PASSWORD_RESET_URL}}

This link expires in 2 days.

See you soon,
The Easy Communities team

fr.text:

Voici un lien pour ça:

Ce lien expire dans 2 jours.

en.subject: Easy Communities | Confirm your login change

Changing login?
